name: The Wizard of OZ: Beyond the Yellow Brick Road
name_original: The Wizard of OZ: Beyond the Yellow Brick Road
description:
Get ready to be whisked away by a tornado to the Land of Magic, as a new
chapter is opened in the classic tale of Dorothy and Toto. Make friends
with the Strawman, Lion and the Tin Man, as they help you along on your
journey back home. What will you find at the end of the Yellow Brick
Road? Who will you meet? A new interpretation of a classic tale made
into an RPG. Now go off to see the Wizard!

Features

• A New Take on a Beloved Story
• High Production Values
•
Innovative Controls
• Accessible for Beginners, Depth of Experienced
Players
